sentences.sContent: The larynx, or voice box, sits lower in the throat in humans than in chimps, one of several .
sentences.sContent_eng: The larynx, or voice box, sits lower in the throat in humans than in chimps, one of several .
sentences.sCn: 人类的喉（亦称音箱），其在咽部的位置要低于黑猩猩，这是人们能说话的原因之一。

sentences.sContent: As the larynx grows during puberty, the cartilage enlarges to accommodate it, creating a bump.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the larynx grows during puberty, the cartilage enlarges to accommodate it, creating a bump.
sentences.sCn: 在青春期，随着喉的发育，软骨组织也相应增大，形成了一个肿块。

sentences.sContent: As evolution continues, the time eventually will come when he will be able to create directly by the word emitted from his spiritualized larynx.
sentences.sContent_eng: As evolution continues, the time eventually will come when he will be able to create directly by the word emitted from his spiritualized larynx.
sentences.sCn: 随着进化的继续，当他能够通过他精神化了的喉头发出的语言直接进行创造的时候，这个时代最重就要到来了。

trans.tranOther: the part in your throat where your voice is produced
